<script>
window.addEventListener('klaviyoForms', (event) => {
    if (event.detail.type === 'submit') {
        // GTM Event
        dataLayer.push({'event': 'sub-bf'});
        // FB Pixel Event
        fbq('track', 'Subscribe');
    }
});
</script>
